description: This file defines a 'Results' page component for a Lightning.js-based quiz application. It displays the user's score and a restart button, managing layout, theme, and navigation.

classes.name: Component
classes.description: A Lightning.js component that renders the Results page with score and restart button.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Returns the initial state object including layout, theme, and text content.

methods.name: components
methods.description: Returns local components used within this component, notably the Button component.

methods.name: onInit
methods.description: Initializes the score display based on the router state.

methods.name: onReady
methods.description: Sets up the restart button's onPress handler to navigate back to the home route.
